events.message: The customer reported a car accident that occurred last night on the highway resulting in significant vehicle damage.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident following review of the initial report and keywords in the claim description.
An insurance agent was assigned to the case to assist the customer with the claim process and coordinate next steps.
The insurance company has sent an official acknowledgement of the claim to the customer, reassuring attention to their case.
The customer was requested to submit photos of vehicle damage, police report, and driverâ€™s license for further evaluation.
Customer has submitted all the required documents including police report, photos, and medical notes from the hospital.
The internal investigation team has started reviewing the submitted evidence and circumstances leading to the collision.
Investigation has been completed confirming the customer's claim details and clarifying liability associated with the accident.
A settlement proposal has been made offering coverage for vehicle repairs and medical expenses related to the accident.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the timely investigation and the proposed settlement amount offered.
The claim has been officially approved by the claims department following acceptance of settlement terms by the customer.
Payment was issued to the customer to cover vehicle repairs and related medical bills resulting from the collision.
The claim has been closed successfully after all payments were processed and customer acknowledged full resolution.
All documents and case files related to the auto accident claim have been archived for future reference.
